categories: Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Rampant was a Victory-class Star Destroyer in the service of the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. It was damaged during a campaign against the Rebel Alliance in the Boeus sector, around 2 ABY. When it was berthed at the Wroona Stardock for repairs, its port-most ion drive exploded in an attack by Wroonian outlaw Kabalard Vinne, a former representative of the Guild of Armament Distributors. Vinne said the sabotage was a response to Governor Norrin's recent crackdown on some of the less legitimate Wroonian guilds.
Rampant is one of several names in the class-specific lists from which the video games Star Wars: Empire at War and its expansion Forces of Corruption randomly select names for capital ships.
